title: Riot points region specific
body: i currently live on guam and i was a free transfer from na to oce when it first came out and i am trying to transfer back, but i cannot use the rp i purchased from where i live which is Guam. how do i transfer my account?

replies.body: They only sell rp for north america server i guess since i cant redeem it on oce.

They don't sell RP for OCE in Guam? I just looked it up on my atlas and geographically, it should be connecting to OCE servers in preference of NA, meaning you should have never gotten this problem in the first place.

I do know that you can't redeem RP if it was made for another region. You should have redeemed it before the transfer. Exactly how much RP did you purchase?

Hello Jasper705,

I am sorry to hear you are having issues with your RP. I really don't know the details on this but it would be best for you to submit a player support ticket for us to help you. I can assure you, we will investigate your issue and get back to you with more information that can help you.

Please submit this here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Thank you,
Riot Cochese
